star_marines.name: Star Marines
star_marines.lore: The Star Marines are some of the God-King's finest warriors, created using advanced genetic science few others understand. In His absence, the Marines follow His written teachings on the conquest of the stars - the Codex Stellar

rules.Momentary Oath: At the start of your Command phase, select one unit from your opponent’s army. Until the start of your next Command phase, each time a +Star Marines+ model from your army makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll.

star_traitors.name: Star Traitors
star_traitors.lore: Ten thousand years ago, as the God-King and his Star Marines were on the cusp of uniting the galaxy, some of the Star Marines uncovered dark powers. They revolted against their father, plunging the God-King's fledgling empire into civil war.

rules.Dark Pacts:
Each time a +Star Traitors+ unit is selected to shoot or fight, it can make a Dark Pact. If it does, select one of the following abilities for that unit’s weapons to gain until the end of the phase:
* +[LETHAL HITS]+
* +[SUSTAINED HITS 1]+
Each time a unit makes a Dark Pact, after it has resolved its attacks, it must take a leadership test; if that test is failed, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

orx.name: Orx
orx.lore: The infamous war cry of the Orx is known and feared throughout the galaxy. When it echoes across the battelfield, bellowed from thousands of barbaric mouths, even the most stoic warriors fear the onslaught to come.

rules.AAAAAAAA!:
Once per battle, at the start of a battle round, call an AAAAAAAA. If you do, until the start of the next battle round:
* Your +Orx+ units are eligible to both Advance and Charge in the same turn.
* Add 1 to the Attacks and Strength properties of melee weapons equipped by your +Orx+ models.
* Your +Orx+ models have a 5++ Invulnerable Save.
